page.title: 11FARM WORK IN SUTTON VENY
page.content:
My Dad is a farm worker.The farm has cattle, sheep and calves. It grows crops and hay for the animals. There are some big and small fields and buldings. In one building they store the crops, in another tractors and in another they put sheep at lambing time. My Dad drives the tractor to the fields.
In the winter his job is ploughing and sowing the fields and then spray- indg them.It takes about three months and then the crops start to grow.
In July we start the harvest.My Dad leaves home at 7.45 am and takes a box with his breakast in. He gets home about 8 pm. Sometimes my brother and I go with him.
